headline: The Bull Case For Arch Capital Group (ACGL) Could Change Following Strong 2025 Results And Underwriting Outperformance – Learn Why
summary: Arch Capital Group Ltd. recently reported full-year 2025 results, with revenue rising to US$19.93 billion and net income of US$4.40 billion, alongside fourth-quarter earnings and revenue that exceeded analyst expectations. An interesting aspect of the update is the combination of stronger underwriting performance and a very strong balance sheet highlighted by analysts as key strengths. With this backdrop and Arch Capital’s better-than-expected quarterly earnings, we’ll examine how its...

headline: Management’s Confidence Boosted Arch Capital Group Ltd. (ACGL)
summary: Baron Fund, an investment management company, released its Q4 2025 letter for “Baron Asset Fund”. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Equities experienced a strong fourth quarter, capping off a volatile year. However, the Russell Midcap Growth Index (the Index) ended the quarter down 3.70%.
